entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Virtualize + SSR support #57130
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #57129
  • Perf improvement: json, json, mvc #57128
  • [Blazor] `RazorComponentEndpointDataSource` ought to implement `GetGroupedEndpoints` #57120
  • Dependencies of bootstrap and jquery-validation in templates are out of date. #57119
  • Assembly lazy load in a Blazor WebProject with rendermode InteractiveWebAssembly(Page/component) #57117
    9.0-rc2
  • Output caching not working on child action #57116
  • How can I use the @rendermode InteractiveServer in the Index.cshtml file? #57113

Closed

  • Schemas for arrays created because properties have descriptions #56919
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json_middleware, json_middleware #57109
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #57114
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #57115
  • [9.0-preview7] Response schema being returned as IResult #56975
    9.0-rc1
  • Issue with key type mismatch in Identity tables after changing to GUID #57080
  • Incorrect swagger.json generation when using FromForm parameters without the WithOpenApi extension method #52284
    9.0-preview4
  • event handlers in layout .NET 8 Blazor #57063
  • [Blazor] Monaco Editor breaks when navigating back and forth with per page rendermode #57100
  • [Blazor] Auto render mode - can not write cookie inside controller #57102
  • Difference between swaggers (Controllers vs Minimal API) #55737
    Discussions
  • Attributes on FromForm parameters are not applied in generated OpenAPI #57082
  • Schemas for parameters should not specify `nullable: true` #56903
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.5.24281.15] Fail to build the app after retargeted to .NET 9.0 with error “System.ArgumentException: An item with the same key has already been added.” #56029
    9.0-rc1
  • Unquarantine CompletionProvider tests after Roslyn upgrade #49126
    9.0-rc1
  • Returning TypedResult.Redirect become EmptyHttpResult #56714
  • Range requests do not work as expected #57070
  • Blazor form submit clicking enter needs to be pressed twice and when input focus it does not work at first time #56940
  • NavigationManager.NavigateToLogout() stuck on authentication/logout-callback #56732

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Allow `<FocusOnNavigate>` to work when rendered statically #57131
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor][Accessibility] At reflow resolution "Hamburger" control is not visible clearly #57127
    area-mvc
  • [Blazor][Accessibility] Display placeholders on form elements #57126
    area-mvc
  • [Blazor][Accessibility] Add aria-label to provide alternative text for screen readers #57125
    area-mvc, area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `3e3b44c` #57123
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `3e3b44c` #57122
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `f1b37e7` to `800de95` #57121
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Fix SignalR server activity name #57118
    area-signalr, 9.0-rc1
  • Fix up nullability and form schema handling in OpenAPI #56957
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks, 9.0-rc1
  • Unquarantine FrameworkParametersCompletionProviderTests #55857
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • Add client span to SignalR .NET client #57101
    area-signalr
  • Propagate trace parent to SignalR hub invocations #57049
    area-signalr
  • Use BaseTypeInfo API to fix up polymorphic schemas #56908
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [8.0] Add support for trusting dev certs on linux #57108
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 8.0.x
  • [Blazor] Add Blazor Web Endpoints to the endpoint data source #57086
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Update Swashbuckle.AspNetCore to 6.6.2 #56266
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Ensure that the hub client proxy generator correctly processes both explicit and inferred generic type arguments #55862
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Microsoft.extensions.api description.server allow specifying environment #55836
    area-mvc, area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • QuickGrid: Add EventCallback<TGridItem> for clicking on a row. #55851
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] Skip timing out MVC template tests in 8.0 #56978
    area-mvc, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
